title: Bring-Your-Own-Craft at Pinot's Palette
description: Join us at Pinot's Palette for a bring-your-own-craft meetup! Drinks will be available from their bar while you create (NA options available), and Chiya Chai is right next door for a delicious dinner option to bring in with you!

title: Coffee & Crafts
description: Bring a craft (spoiler: anything is a craft!), meet us at Pilot Project, and enjoy their full espresso bar while you create.
